reviews.review_msg: Yupin is unable to clearly communicate her thoughts to the class.
Zahra was a brilliant professor! There is one group project, quizzes, midterms, and attendance! She is a more than fair grader on both the midterm and the group project! Highly recommend!

One of SFU Business' top marketing profs!  Extremely passionate about the material, and about teaching in general. She was able to teach difficult concepts in a way that made sense for the entire class!  Definitely hot as well!
may seem arrogant/strict but knows her stuff and marks fairly - distinguished in her field
A highly effective class if you want to improve your stats skills.

She will NOT give specific help. Or rather she'll tell everyone that she's too busy and yet stay in office and then email everyone that no one approached her. Either that or she'll tell everyone in class how much time she'd spent in preparing the mid-terms. I understand that she's a busy person, but I felt that most are learnt from my own reading.

The problem isn't that she calls on ppl for answers, it's that she asks ridiculous questions. eg. WE DON'T KNOW how many people we should sample without knowing the standard deviation and desired precision, so stop asking. Her marking is the same way in that it seems very arbitrary. No breakdowns are given and her expectations are vague, at best.
hard to please her.. don't know what she wants.. don't understand her in-class questions.. fast-paced discussions.. calls out your name for answers..
